pkgmetadata.longdescription: JSON-able data types====================This library provides and abstract base class ``JSONable`` which enables easy definition of trivially JSON-able python objects.* **Installation:** ``pip install jsonable``:Example: >>> import jsonable >>> >>> >>> class Fruit(jsonable.Type): ... __slots__ = ('type', 'weight') ... ... def initialize(self, type, weight): ... self.type = str(type) ... self.weight = float(weight) ... >>> class Pie(jsonable.Type): ... __slots__ = ('fruit',) ... ... def initialize(self, fruit): ... self.fruit = [Fruit(f) for f in fruit] ... ... >>> pie = Pie([Fruit('apple', 10.3), Fruit('cherry', 2)]) >>> >>> doc = pie.to_json() >>> doc {'fruit': [{'weight': 10.3, 'type': 'apple'}, {'weight': 2.0, 'type': 'cherry'}]} >>> >>> pie == Pie(doc) True
